verses.name: Numbers 21:33
verses.text: And they turned and went up by the way of Bashan: and Og the king of Bashan went out against them, he, and all his people, to the battle at Edrei.

verses.name: Numbers 21:34
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Fear him not: for I have delivered him into thy hand, and all his people, and his land; and thou shalt do to him as thou didst unto Sihon king of the Amorites, which dwelt at Heshbon.

verses.name: Numbers 21:35
verses.text: So they smote him, and his sons, and all his people, until there was none left him alive: and they possessed his land.
